EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar, Innovate Through Extreme Automation with voke, inc.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>
Analyst Webinar: Innovate Through Extreme Automation
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our webinar, “Innovate through Extreme Automation.” We hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. Your participation and engaging questions made all the difference.
If you’re interested in seeing this and other webinars, visit www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts. <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team
Theresa Lanowitz
Founder, voke, inc.
Wolfgang Platz
Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
